translations: v．吃早餐：在早晨进食的行为。
· We were breakfasting on the terrace.

phrs.translation: 当作早餐；对于早餐来说
欧式早餐（仅有咖啡和果酱面包）
欧洲的一种简易旅馆；住宿加早餐
n. 英式早餐（熏肉、蛋、烤面包和果酱）
丰盛的早餐；精选早餐套餐

sentences.sentence: A millionaire may enjoy breakfasting off orange juice and Ryvita biscuits; an unemployed man doesn't.
sentences.translation: 一个百万富翁享受早餐吃橙汁和Ryvita饼干；无业男子却不能。

sentences.sentence: A few moments later he was breakfasting at the very table at which jean Valjean had sat on the previous evening.
sentences.translation: 过了一会，他坐在昨晚冉阿让坐过的那张桌子边用早餐。

sentences.sentence: As the name implies, after a good night of sleep, you are essentially doing two vital tasks when you are breakfasting.
sentences.translation: 它意味着，在睡一个好觉之后，当你吃早餐时其实就是正在做两件重要的事情。
